> i got a soldier to level 500. he was taken through all original 
> levels, all my levels, dph's, and most of the tevfifty.
> 
> whirlwind was ridiculous, but otherwise i saw no problems

Well, I've had some characters run too fast to use teleporters 
effectively.  Then, as most people know, I have crashed the game twice 
by exeeding a few limits.

My current method for achieving so high depends on what character I am 
using.  If it's an archmage, I just take out slime by summoning an 
army of slime.  Anything else and I resort to using using Tents.  
Tents create high experience leveled skeletons that are destroyed when 
the tent is destroyed.  

I used my bonus scenario to get the jump start.  Then I starting 
destroying tents (after equiping myself with level 5000 potions of 
magic, invisibility, flight, and invulvernability).  Then I have been 
using the scenario converter to clone new scenarios to take on.  I'm 
at experience level 258.  I have been destroying level 5000 tents.  I 
am going to work my way up to level 60,000 tents.  Talk about gaining 
lots of experience.
